product_overview: Mind-Sync is an AI-powered productivity workspace designed as an intelligent "Second Brain" to help users capture, organize, and execute their personal and professional tasks and goals seamlessly. It integrates task management, calendar syncing, real-time meeting transcription, note-taking, focus tools, and productivity analytics to enable optimal life and work organization.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive productivity tool combining task, notes, calendar, and meetings.
Integrate advanced AI features for meeting transcription, summarization, and smart scheduling.
Enable seamless user authentication and secure data management.
Offer a user-friendly interface with rich interaction modes like Kanban boards and calendar views.
Enhance user focus and productivity tracking with dedicated timers and analytics dashboards.
key_features: User Authentication and Management via Clerk for secure and smooth login experiences.
Task Management system supporting creation, editing, deletion, subtasks, priorities, and recurring tasks.
Kanban Board with drag-and-drop capabilities for efficient task organization.
Calendar Integration with Google Calendar sync and time-blocking drag-and-drop scheduling.
Notes System featuring a rich-text editor and AI-driven summaries for capturing ideas and meeting highlights.
Analytics Dashboard providing productivity insights through heatmaps and weekly progress charts.
Focus Mode with Pomodoro timer and ambient soundscapes for distraction-free work sessions.
Meeting Mode offering real-time transcription, AI-generated meeting minutes, action items, and an audio visualizer.
Advanced AI Features leveraging Google Gemini for smart suggestions, natural language processing, and scheduling optimization.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via the Clerk authentication system.
User creates, edits, and manages tasks using the Kanban board or task lists, assigning priorities and recurrence as needed.
User schedules tasks through calendar view with optional Google Calendar synchronization and AI-assisted auto-scheduling.
User takes and edits rich-text notes, with the ability to generate AI summaries for meeting notes or brainstorming.
User activates Focus Mode to use the Pomodoro timer with ambient sounds to enhance concentration.
During meetings, user engages Meeting Mode to receive live transcription, audio visualization, and AI-generated summaries.
User views productivity analytics and weekly reports to monitor progress and adjust goals accordingly.
validation_criteria: All user authentication flows must be secure and functional, supporting sign-up, sign-in, and session management.
Task creation, editing, deletion, and recurrence features must work correctly with data persisted reliably in the database.
Drag-and-drop functionality in Kanban board and calendar views must be smooth and intuitive without lag or errors.
Notes system must support rich-text editing and AI summary generation with minimal latency.
AI-powered meeting transcription and summarization must be accurate and real-time with appropriate UI feedback.
Focus Mode timer and ambient soundscapes should function continuously and without disruption.
Analytics dashboards should accurately reflect data and load efficiently across devices.
Google Calendar synchronization features must maintain data consistency and handle conflicts gracefully.
